LanguageData.SW.FactionTookYourWarrant: {FACTION_name} has accepted your warrant on {1}, and is actively completing it.
LanguageData.SW.FactionCompletedWarrantDesc: Members of {FACTION_name} are outside of your base with your completed warrant on {1}. They are demanding payment of {2} silver before drop off.
LanguageData.SW.FactionFailedWarrant: {FACTION_name} has failed to complete your warrant on {1}
LanguageData.SW.WarrantOnYourColonistDesc: A warrant was placed on a colonist which increases raid chance until the warrant is paid off. Player can choose to pay the warrant amount to void the warrant. Or leave the warrant and wait until it expires.
LanguageData.SW.NoEnoughMoneyToCompensate: You don't have {0} silver to compensate this warrant
LanguageData.SW.NoPublicWarrantsAvailable: There are no public warrants available. Check again later.
LanguageData.SW.NoRelatedWarrantsAvailable: There are no related warrants currently posted.
LanguageData.SW.CommandFulfillWarrantFailInsufficient: Your caravan must have {0} to finish this warrant.
LanguageData.SW.ChanceOfWarrantsMadeOnColonist: Chance of warrants being made on colonist: {0}
LanguageData.SW.EnableWarrantsOnColonists: Enable warrants being made on colonists
LanguageData.SW.EnableWarrantsOnArtifact: Enable warrants being made on artifacts
LanguageData.SW.EnableWarrantsOnAnimals: Enable warrants being made on animals
LanguageData.SW.EnableWarrantRewardScaling: Enable warrant reward threshold (minimum 5% from player's wealth)
LanguageData.SW.WarrantOnNonHostileWarning: You have selected a non-hostile pawn for your warrant. Are you sure you would like to continue? This will damage relations with {FACTION_name}.
LanguageData.SW.YouMustFillAmountForDeadReward: You must fill in the amount for the dead reward.
LanguageData.SW.YouMustFillAmountForCaptureReward: You must fill in the amount for the capture reward.
LanguageData.SW.YouMustFillAmountForReward: You must fill in the amount for the reward.
LanguageData.SW.InsufficientReward: This warrant has automatically been flagged for insufficient rewards. This will increase chances of failure and extend the time until completion. Consider raising your reward in a new warrant to increase the chances of success.
LanguageData.SW.FactionDroppedWarrant: {FACTION_name} has dropped your warrant on {1} because they are enemies now.
LanguageData.SW.RaidReasonKillCapture: They are looking to kill or capture {PAWN_nameDef} due to {1}.
LanguageData.SW.RaidReasonCapture: They are looking to capture {PAWN_nameDef} due to {1}.
LanguageData.SW.RaidReasonKill: They are looking to kill {PAWN_nameDef} due to {1}.
